check-in.title: Check-in at a place.
check-in.description: With this application you can check-in at a place.
check-in.hash-false-body: The scanned room does not exist, please contact the local IT support.
check-in.qr-false-body: This code is not for this application. Please use a check-in QR code.
check-in.success-checkin-seat-body: You have successfully checked into {{room}} at {{seat}}.
check-in.no-permission-body: You have no permissions to perform this action. Please contact the local IT support.
check-in.already-checkin-body: You are already registered here. You can extend your current registration or check out at this location.
check-in.invalid-seatnr-body: The seat number entered does not exist. Please contact the local IT support. or enter a different seat number.
check-in.no-seatnr-body: The specified room has no seats. Please register without a seat number.
check-in.invalid-input-body: Your input was invalid. Please try again.
check-in.success-refresh-body: You have successfully extended your check-in in the {{room}}.
check-in.refresh-failed-body: Refreshing your check-in failed. Please try again.
check-in.other-checkins-notification-body: You have one more check-in at another location. Show all check-ins
check-in.other-checkins-notification-body_plural: You have {{count}} more check-ins at other locations. Show all check-ins
check-in.data-protection: What does the university do with your data? You can find more detailed information on the "check-in" app under the university's privacy policy.
check-in.how-to: Scan the attached QR code or manually select a location to check in. In the event of a risk, you will be contacted by the university by email.
check-in.manual-checkin: Please enter the name of the place where you want to register.

check-out.title: Show all check-ins
check-out.description: With this application you can check-out from your registered locations.
check-out.checkout-success-body: You have successfully checked out of the {{room}}.
check-out.already-checked-out-body: No active checkin was found at this location. You are probably already checked out.
check-out.checkout-failed-body: Your check-out from {{room}} failed. We're sorry, something went wrong.
check-out.no-checkins-message: You are currently not checked-in at any location.

guest-check-in.title: Guest registration
guest-check-in.description: With this application you can register a guest at a location.
guest-check-in.invalid-email-address-body: The e-mail address you entered does not correspond to a valid format. Please check your input and try again.
guest-check-in.error-permission-message: You need to have a staff account to use this function!
guest-check-in.no-time-body: Please enter a time for check-out.
guest-check-in.max-time-body: Please enter a different time for check-out.
guest-check-in.data-protection: With the check-in I confirm that I have made the data protection declaration for the "check-in" app known to the guest I have checked in.
guest-check-in.how-to: Check in a guest without a university account at a location for the duration of their visit. The check out takes place automatically at the specified time. In the event of a risk, the guest will be contacted by university by email.
guest-check-in.no-seatnr-body: No seat number was specified. Please enter a valid seat number.
guest-check-in.already-checkin-body: You are already registered here. You will not be able to register here again until your current registration has expired.

info.title: Information
info.description: With this application you get information about checkin.tugraz.at.

report-risk.title: Report risk
report-risk.description: With this application, you will receive information on how to report a risk of infection.
report-risk.text: If you are a suspected COVID-19 case or a case of illness, please report this immediately to your organization!

error-login-message: You need to be logged in to use this function!
